quest.name: Medicine for Tad The Second
quest.description: Tad, a boy in Semos Hostel, needs help to get his medicine.

offerQuest.message: I'm not feeling well... I need to get a bottle of medicine made. Can you fetch me an empty #flask?

replyCompleted.message: You've already helped me out! I'm feeling much better now.

replyWithOffer.message: You could probably get a flask from #Margaret.

questAccepted.message: Great! Please go as quickly as you can. *sneeze*

questRefused.message: Oh, please won't you change your mind? *sneeze*

replyWithOffer.message: Margaret is the maid in the inn just down the street. So, will you help?

reply.message: Margaret is the maid in the inn just down the street.

remindWithoutItem.message: *cough* Oh dear... I really need this medicine! Please hurry back with the #flask from #Margaret.

quest.name: Cloak Collector
quest.description: Josephine, a young woman who live in Ados/Fado. Josephine asks you to bring her a cloak in every colour available on the mainland

questCompleted.message: Hi again, lovely. The cloaks still look great. Thanks!

offerQuest.message: At the moment I'm obsessed with #cloaks! They come in so many colours. I want all the pretty ones!

questRefused.message: Oh ... you're not very friendly. Bye then.

greetingWithoutItem.message: I want [quantity] . That's [items] . Will you find them?

itemBought.message: Wow, thank you! What else did you bring?

lastItemResponse.message: Oh, they look so beautiful all together, thank you. Please take this black cloak in return, I don't like the colour.

remindWithoutItem.message: Oh, I'm disappointed. You don't really have [items] with you.

itemMissing.message: You've already brought that cloak to me.

itemNeeded.message: Sorry, that's not a cloak I asked you for.

quest.name: Coal For Haunchy 2
quest.description: Haunchy needs coal for his barbeque.

questCompleted.message: I can go on with grilling my tasty steaks now! Thank you!

offerQuest.message: I cannot use wood for this huge BBQ. To keep the heat I need some really old stone coal but there isn't much left. The problem is, that I can't fetch it myself because my steaks would burn then so I have to stay here. Can you bring me 25 pieces of #coal for my BBQ please?

replyCompleted.message: I can go on with grilling my tasty steaks now! Thank you!

replyWithOffer.message: Coal isn't easy to find. You normally can find it somewhere in the ground but perhaps you are lucky and find some in the old Semos Mine tunnels...

replyIfRepeatable.message: The last coal you brought me is mostly gone again. Will you bring me some more?

replyIfNotRepeatable.message: The coal amount behind my counter is still high enough. I will not need more for

questAccepted.message: Thank you! If you have found 25 pieces, say #coal to me so I know you have it. I'll be sure to give you a nice and tasty reward.

questRefused.message: Oh, never mind. I thought you love BBQs like I do. Bye then.

reply.message: Thank you!! Take from my grill!

questReminder.message: You don't have the coal amount which I need yet. Go and pick some more pieces up, please.
